title: Teemo Build
body:
What are your guys thoughts on this Teemo build? I know it's not AP but has a lot of on hit. What items would you substitute and why?

Swifties or Zerkers
Trinity Force
Blade of the Ruined King
Frozen Mallet
Wit's End
Rageblade

replies.body: try zzrot banner team with a frozen mallet and liandrys. u deal alot of base dmg and can just split top and shit on kids
